Proton UI

An Elegant Vue.js Component Library Built For Atomic CSS Frameworks

Get Started →

BEM Styles

When it comes to styling, we opted to use BEM naming conventions to allow you to use whatever atomic CSS framework you desire.

Speed of Light

We want Proton to be as performant and light-weight as possible, so we don't load in any unnecessary dependencies.

Open Source

We believe in giving back to the community. Proton is fully open source, so feel free to use it in any type of project.
